ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Twinking is not nearly as unbalancing as most folks presume. How many times have you seen someone in armor - with weapons WAY over their level - running
ygData.messageBody:
>And all these balance issues, while significant, don't take into account
>twinking, which is the biggest unbalancing factor, I think. Of course, with
>the scarcity of attainable items and the game bias against those of us who
>prefer to solo, I can see why eBay sales are so brisk.
>
>Aranlas Starchaser
>Master Bard


Twinking is not nearly as unbalancing as most folks presume. How many times
have you seen someone in armor - with weapons WAY over their level -
running from an orc pawn - or screaming for help?

Does it help at all? Sure, some. Does a lvl one in lvl 30 armor have that
much of an edge? Nope, not really, not till their skills catch up - what
they usually have is a very well dressed corpse.

IMHO - anyone that twinks under lvl 5 is just askin to lose a ton of stuff.
Be just my luck - I'd die, the server would crash for about an hour - ouch.
